Franz Schubert

Four Fugues, D 37A

c. 1813

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 6'

  • 1. B-flat major
  • 2. B-flat major
  • 3. B-flat major
  • 4. B-flat major

These four pieces are all incomplete. In the Deutsch catalogue, they were originally numbered D 967 before being re-numbered to D 37A.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/4 · BA 5525 · Klavierstücke I · ed. David Goldberger

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

2. B-flat major
